    Compare 2 seurat object (used to generate QC figures between pre-fitlered and filtered data)

    compare_qc.Rd

    Compare 2 seurat object (used to generate QC figures between pre-fitlered and filtered data)

    compare_qc(
  object1,
  object2,
  comp_name,
  colori = NULL,
  qc_dir = ".",
  minFeatures = 500,
  mtPerc = 20
)

    Arguments

    object1

    seurat object 1

    object2

    seurat object 2

    comp_name

    name to use for the figures

    colori

    set of 2 colors to use for plotting | Default c("#D3D3D3","#FFB140")

    qc_dir

    output directory

    minFeatures

    number of genes

    mtPerc

    percentage fo mt genes

    Details

    Details Refer to the pre-processing article for a detailed usage and examples

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
compare_qc(object1, object2, "comparison_1")
}
